Measure Word Chart

Measure Words （量词）may just be the nightmare of Chinese students worldwide! While their usefulness is often debated, they’re something which you simply must get your head around if you want to read, write or speak a reasonable level of Chinese.

In this article we take a look at the most common words and when they come in use. We’ve classified them into three separate categories - Beginners , Intemediate and Advanced

· Beginner – The most common words you will need to know on a day-to-day basis. Also includes some counter words that are not that common, but are often taught to beginners.

· Intermediate – They might be less common that the words for beginners, but you will definitely need to know all these to be able to speak a reasonable level of Chinese.

· Advanced – These words come up from time to time, but definitely aren’t used often in everyday speech.

· Expert – A significant proportion of Chinese probably don’t know these specialized words. Not worth learning unless you really want to impress!

If you feel like studying just measure words you can easily add them to a flashcard list

Beginner

本

běn

Books

杯

bēi

Cup

层

層

céng

layers, levels in a building, etc

cì
